title: Savage Lands v0.2.8
description:
FIXED:
Lots of bug fixes (thanks to the community for finding and reporting these!)

    Some duping bugs have been exterminated
    Additional improvements to frame rate, specifically targeting the area around bear spawns
    Tree synchronization should be more stable when joining games
    Wolves no longer turn away from Player while attacking
    Creatures can no longer be pushed around
    General stability and networking tweaks


    New audio added when player intereacts with campfires
    Players now shiver when cold is below 15%


New options have been added to Settings:

    Water
    Shader Quality
    Mouse Smoothing




Crafting:
Additional recipe changes for higher tier armor and weapon by Game Update #4

Bandages:

    Bandages now give 15% health
    Frost Fern bandages now give 35% health


Buildings:

    Building diagrams can now be disassembled by the player by hitting it
    Building diagrams will now decompose overtime if components are not applied
    Building diagram rendering distance has been reduced to 25 meters for performance
        Blacksmithing structures building plan added (includes forge)
        Leanto now produces some heat
        Leanto build requirements have been reduced
    Pike of Resurrection now plays ambient audio when active


Materials:

    Larger rocks will now produce more components and require less hits to produce an object
    Radiant Gems have been added to more larger rocks
    Radiant gems now emit a light source
    Coal has been added to the rock tables



Food:

    Consumable system has been revamped
        Meat now provides large amounts of hunger satiation
        Berries, nuts, and bandages now provide health boosts in addition to other beneficial effects
        Cured meat stack count increased from 3 to 5
    Decayed flesh: Decayed flesh is like playing Russian roulette
        Decayed flesh now has a chance to restore 25% health
        Decayed Flesh now has a chance to consume 20% hunger
